article.headline: Fox Nation host Tomi Lahren tells Joe Biden that he 'might as well carry a purse with that mask'
article.body: Tomi Lahren Getty Images Be a man, Joe. Wearing a mask is for chicks! Fox Nation host Tomi Lahren apparently sees it that way, according to this tweeted response to Joe Biden's message Monday night urging Americans to "wear a mask": iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } As Lahren's name shot up Twitter's TWTR trending list, the tweet was quickly ratioed (when comments outnumber retweets or likes). So, from an attention-seeking standpoint, she nailed it. But across social media Lahren was largely being judged by other standards. Here are just a few of the highlights: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } Meanwhile, Trump is back at the White House after spending three nights at the Walter Reed military hospital being treated for the coronavirus-borne disease COVID-19. "Feeling really good! Don't be afraid of Covid. Don't let it dominate your life," he wrote on Twitter. Trump is "not out of the woods" yet, but he'll have "world-class medical care 24/7" at the White House, the president's physician, Dr. Sean Conley, said Monday afternoon.
